summary: WHILE DRIVING THE ABS, TRACTION CONTROL, AND DOWN HILL BREAK ASSIST LIGHT BEGAN TO COME ON NORMAL HIGHWAY DRIVING.  WOULD STOP AND RESTART THE CAR THE LIGHTS WOULD GO OFF, AFTER A FEW DRIVING MILES THE LIGJTS CAME BACK ON AND STAYED.  NOW THE BREAK WARNING LIGHT WILL ILLUMINATE SOMETIMES.  I OWNER VEHICLE 52,000 THOUSANDS ON VEHICLE.  ALL SERVICE UP TO DATE AND PERFORMED BY KIA DEALERSHIP.
